page.title: 19CROSSGATES AREA THE FUTURE 1
page.content: What will the future be like for the Crossgates and Halbeath area. In this time of economic recession all over Europe, there are many changes: unemployment and more leisure time are a thing of the present. The Keirsbeath Open Cast Mine will continue to employ its forty men for at least another twelve years.With all the shaft mines in the area already closed down, the memories of a booming coal industry still remain. Some of the few shops in Crossgates have closed down, maybe because of the many cheaper hypermarkets opening in the area. The by-pass near Crossgates will reduce traffic in an already quiet town. More shops and people will leave without new industry being pumped in.
